tool_description: Tracks and reports delivery status, engagement metrics, and delivery issues for sent notifications across all channels.

include_events.description: Include detailed delivery events in response

error_messages: Message not found: The provided message_id does not exist in the system.
Tracking unavailable: Delivery tracking is not available for this message type or channel.
Status not yet available: Delivery status is not yet available, try again later.
usage: Provide the message_id to get delivery status. Set include_events to true for detailed event history.

delivery_status.description: Current delivery status: queued, sent, delivered, failed, bounced

sent_time.description: Time when message was sent (date-time format)

delivered_time.description: Time when message was delivered (date-time format)

engagement_metrics.description: Engagement metrics like opens, clicks in key=value format

failure_reason.description: Reason for delivery failure if applicable
